entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
